title: Lawmakers grill FDA commissioner over baby formula shortage - The Associated Press
content:
1. Lawmakers grill FDA commissioner over baby formula shortage  The Associated Press
  2. How the baby formula shortage links back to a federal nutrition program  POLITICO
  3. FDA commissioner to testify about baby formula shortage  CBS Mornings
  4. Baby Formula Shortage: Top House Democrat to Grill FDA Chief on Factory Plans  Bloomberg
  5. Baby formula shortage leads to congressional scrutiny of FDA  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: WASHINGTON (AP) â€” The head of the Food and Drug Administration told lawmakers Thursday that a shuttered baby formula factory  could be up and running as soon as next week, though he sidestepped questions about whether his agency should have intervened earlier at the plant at the center of the national shortage .
